sub_title: PhD Candidate (Promovendus) at Utrecht University | AI | Computer Vision | Computer Graphics | Computer Animation | Mentor | Musician
summary:
Extremely interested in Computer Vision, Computer Graphics, Machine Learning and Deep Learning. Video games, immersive technology and visual effects enthusiast. 

Recent computer science master graduate with expertise in visual computing and communication. Aspired to make a career in research and development in the field of Computer Vision and AI. Long term dreamer to make community impact through my work and contributions for a better world for everyone.  

On top of that, I am a musician, I play lead guitar in my band, Minerva. Minerva is an emerging heavy/groove metal band based in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Besides performing hundreds of live shows throughout the country over the years, we released our first studio album in 2013 and now we are working on our second studio album.
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3phSuSjTMPcF9Tr02vbCnj
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/minervabangladesh/feed
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/minervabangladesh

awards.title: Cum Laude (TU Delft)
awards.description:
The Board of Examiners awards the predicate cum laude if the following requirements have been met:
1. The weighted average of credit points obtained for the courses in the programme, not including the Master’s thesis project, is at least 8.0
2. The result for the Master’s thesis project is at least 9.0
3. The length of study does not exceed 2 years 

Less than 5% of all the graduates are awarded Cum Laude by TU Delft

projects.title: Frozen Flame - 3D game developed with OpenGL
projects.description: Frozen Flame is a 3D video game developed with OpenGL as a part of "3D Computer Graphics and Animation" course in TU Delft. We were to make our own game engine in OpenGL and we used numerous state of the art computer graphics techniques to make it a reality.

projects.title: Musicality - A game to improve musical perception
projects.description: Musicality is an android game that was developed to improve musical perception in the players. The game was developed by 5 Computer Science master's student as a part of "Building Serious Games" course in TU Delft and also as further research purpose.

contributors.headline: PhD Candidate (Promovendus) at Utrecht University | AI | Computer Vision | Computer Graphics | Computer Animation | Mentor | Musician

projects.title: Thesis: Design and develop doctor's dictation kit.
projects.description:
· I did my thesis on machine learning narrowing it down to voice recognition.
· Designed and developed a doctor’s dictation kit using JULIUS and HTK on Raspberry Pi running on “raspbian” operating system.
· The main goal was to train the machine to understand South Asian accent and operate accordingly.

profile_positions.description:

- 4D Reconstruction
- Silhouette extraction in dynamic scene
- Sfs (Shape from silhouette)
- Visual Hull
- MaskRCNN
- Dense Conditional Random Field
- Bounding volume
- Marching cube
- SLAM
